## ValueRef.addListener() method

Add a listener. This will return a remover.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addListener(fn: Fn<T>): () => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>Fn&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`() => void`

## Example


```ts
React.useEffect(() => ref.addListener(setState))

```
